content: don t ask me what possessed me to design and knit this sweater over the weekend really it will just be tmi but let s just say the intended recipient has retired from active modeling duty and will be quietly enjoying his sweater in private the teddy bear rollneck sweater is worked from the top down using raglan shaping no seaming required the rollneck is simply formed by knitting everything in stockinette with no ribbing or borders this makes it a super easy and quick knit because after all… it is for a teddy bear finished measurements approximately 4 inches long and 6 inches wide should fit any medium-sized bear for reference the brown bear in the picture measures about 8 tall when sitting the white doggy below is a bit taller--maybe 9 5
